name: Funny Kid's Throat Doctor
description:
little Kids, boys & girls are not feeling good in their throat. Something might be hurting them. Painful expression and coughing is causing them trouble. Clinic is loaded with little patients. Do you want to be the ultimate throat doctor to run the clinic? Become the super throat doctor you always wanted to be to treat the patients in your clinic.
Have you ever experienced throat infection? Have you ever felt a sore throat? It’s time you cure your patients having throat problems. It’s fun and additive for kids, boys and girls. You have a complete tool box that you need to be an expert throat doctor. Let’s make your dream come true and become a super throat doctor.


=> Select a patient
=> Use throat light and tongue object to view complete throat
=> Use different objects to clean
=> Zoom inside with a camera
=> Use various objects to clean the throat

No Ads In this games download now this amazing games.

If you like this games rate us and check it our other interesting and popular kids games.
